entry.title: Anti-Flame Forest Smoothie
entry.summary: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Anti-Flame Forest Smoothie</title> <style> body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6; background-color: #f9f9f9; color: #333; padding: 2rem; max-width: 800px; margin: auto; } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; color: #2c3e50; border-bottom: 2px solid #8e44ad;…
entry.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Anti-Flame Forest Smoothie</title>
  <style>
    body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6; background-color: #f9f9f9; color: #333; padding: 2rem; max-width: 800px; margin: auto; }
    h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; color: #2c3e50; border-bottom: 2px solid #8e44ad; }
    h2 { font-size: 1.75rem; color: #16a085; margin-top: 2rem; }
    ul, ol { background-color: #ffffff; padding: 1rem; border-left: 4px solid #3498db; border-radius: 8px; }
    li { margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
    p { background-color: #ecf0f1; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 6px; }
    .notes { background-color: #fff3cd; border-left: 5px solid #ffc107; }
  </style>
  <script type="application/ld+json">
  {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",
    "@type": "Recipe",
    "name": "Anti-Flame Forest Smoothie",
    "description": "Antioxidant-rich smoothie to reduce inflammation and repair oxidative stress post-hike.",
    "recipeCategory": "Smoothie",
    "recipeCuisine": "Healthy",
    "keywords": "anti-inflammatory, smoothie, post-workout",
    "nutrition": {
      "@type": "NutritionInformation",
      "calories": "150 kcal",
      "proteinContent": "4g",
      "carbohydrateContent": "28g",
      "fatContent": "1g"
    },
    "recipeIngredient": [
      "100g frozen blueberries",
      "75g frozen cherries",
      "1 tsp grated fresh ginger or ½ tsp powdered",
      "1 tsp turmeric (with a pinch of black pepper for absorption)",
      "1 tsp Critical Greens Powder",
      "200ml cold elderflower tea (brewed & cooled)",
      "1 cube frozen spinach",
      "Optional: 1 tsp honey or 1 date (if needed)"
    ],
    "recipeInstructions": [
      {
        "@type": "HowToStep",
        "text": "Add all ingredients to your NutriBullet."
      },
      {
        "@type": "HowToStep",
        "text": "Blend on high for 45 seconds until rich and smooth."
      },
      {
        "@type": "HowToStep",
        "text": "Taste and adjust with a date or more tea if needed."
      },
      {
        "@type": "HowToStep",
        "text": "Enjoy chilled post-workout or post-nature wander."
      }
    ],
    "recipeNotes": "Blueberries + cherries provide polyphenols and anthocyanins to combat oxidative stress. Turmeric and ginger reduce inflammation, especially helpful post-exercise."
  }
  </script>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Original content remains unchanged -->
  <h1>Anti-Flame Forest Smoothie</h1>
  <p><strong>Type:</strong> Smoothie (Antioxidant + Anti-inflammatory heavy)</p>
  <p><strong>Main Goals:</strong> Reduce inflammation, repair oxidative stress, protect cells post-hike</p>
  <!-- Rest of the original HTML content -->
</body>
</html>

entry.title: Recipe 1: Power Pepper Recovery
entry.summary: { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "Recipe", "name": "Power Pepper Recovery", "author": { "@type": "Person", "name": "ChatGPT" }, "description": "Anti-inflammatory smoothie designed to help use up frozen peppers. Great for post-workout recovery and rich in antioxidants.", "recipeYield": "1 serving", "prepTime": "PT5M", "totalTime": "PT5M", "recipeCategory": "Smoothie", "recipeCuisine": "Health",…
entry.content:
Power Pepper Recovery

A nutrient-rich, anti-inflammatory powerhouse smoothie for post-hike revival.

Ingredients

  • 100g frozen mixed peppers
  • 1 frozen banana
  • 75g frozen mango or pineapple
  • 1 cube frozen spinach
  • 200ml cooled nettle tea
  • 1 tsp hemp protein powder
  • ½ tsp cinnamon
  • 1 tsp cacao powder
  • Optional: 1 medjool date (if you want more sweetness)

Instructions

  • Brew nettle tea and allow it to cool completely.
  • Combine all ingredients in your NutriBullet or high-speed blender.
  • Blend on high for 60 seconds until smooth and creamy.
  • Taste and adjust sweetness by adding the date if needed.

Nutritional Highlights

  • Calories: ~180 kcal
  • Protein: 5g
  • Carbohydrates: 32g
  • Fat: 2.5g
  • Micros: Vitamin C, Iron, Magnesium, Potassium, Beta-Carotene
  • Actions: Antioxidant, Anti-inflammatory, Muscle Recovery
